sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description/>
        <name>PSM - update max & min prices</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[function updateDocumentation(docObj) {
    var documenationGr = new GlideRecord('sys_documentation');
    documenationGr.addEncodedQuery(docObj.query);
    documenationGr.query();
    while (documenationGr.next())
        new global.PTGlobalAPI().updateDictionary(documenationGr, docObj.attribute);
}

var docArr = [
	{
		'query': 'element=max_known_list_price^name=sn_shop_supplier_product',
		'attribute': {
			'label': 'Max known price (Deprecated)'
		}
	},
	{
		'query': 'element=min_known_list_price^name=sn_shop_supplier_product',
		'attribute': {
			'label': 'Min known price (Deprecated)'
		}
	}
];

docArr.forEach(updateDocumentation);

var productGr = new GlideRecord('sn_shop_supplier_product');
productGr.addEncodedQuery('max_known_list_price_new=^ORmin_known_list_price_new=');
productGr.query();
while (productGr.next())
	new SupplierProductUtil(productGr).updateMinMaxPrice(true);
	]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2023-03-16 09:12:38</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>9f5476a677e521101236cc6dcd5a9934</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>PSM - update max & min prices</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="">45f917bd533323007388ddeeff7b12b6</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="">45f917bd533323007388ddeeff7b12b6</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_9f5476a677e521101236cc6dcd5a9934</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2023-03-23 14:38:01</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
